name: Maza Mania Beta-1
description:
IMPORTANT: NO PAUSE SCREEN! THE ONLY WAY TO QUIT IN GAME IS TO PLAY WINDOWED!

Maze Mania Beta-1 is powered by Unity and is free to play, and will remain so through the beta and official release of the game. 

Maze Mania Beta-1 has 4 out of 12 planned mazes in the game, currently the end of each maze is marked with a green block to signal the end of the current maze and the start of a new one.

The creator of Maze Mania is open to feedback about the game so he can improve upon it to make it better and more enjoyable. 

Controls: W to walk, A to turn left D to turn right

Once completed, (very, very, short game.) please rate the difficulty of each maze from, beginner, intermediate, and hard. Thank you.
